item.title: Brendan's Treehouse
item.description: Coordinates: 20, -1180 (In the air) Description Brendan’s Tree house is a unique and quirky structure nestled beneath the sprawling branches of a large dark oak tree.

item.title: Brewery And Tavern
item.description: Coordinates: 550, -1500 Description Tomas’s brewery and tavern is a bustling hub of activity in Joe’s classic village.

item.title: Constitution Of Danada
item.description: Article I: Purpose The purpose of this constitution is to establish a fair and just system of government for the Country of Danada and to provide for the protection of the rights and freedoms of its citizens.

item.title: Country Of Danada
item.description: Coordinates: -2100, -700 Description Danada is a bustling resort town located in a snowy area. It is a hub of activity, attracting tourists and locals alike who come to enjoy the snow and scenic beauty of the region.

item.title: Found Ruined Places
item.description: The Apartments

item.title: Galstoner's House
item.description: Coordinates: 0, -1150 Description The Galstoner’s Billy Shop is a charming and cosy home located within the mysterious and enchanted Mushroom Kingdom.

item.title: Joe's Classic Village
item.description: Coordinates: 550, -1500 Description Joe’s Classic Village is a charming and thriving community that pays homage to the classic building styles of early versions of Minecraft.

item.title: Joe's House & Villager Breeder
item.description: Coordinates: 500, -1550 Description Joe’s house is a magnificent two-story building, embodying the leadership and success of the village’s head.

item.title: List Of Current Places
item.description: Country Of Danada The Mushroom Kingdom The Persian Empire Sarah’s Base Mac’s Pagoda Joe’s Classic Village

item.title: Mac's Pagoda
item.description: Coordinates: -1850, -350 Description Mac’s Base is a magnificent structure nestled within a peaceful forest of elegant sakura trees.

item.title: Poor Village On The Outskirts Of The Persian Empire
item.description: Coordinates: -2250, -700 Description Poor village on the outskirts of the Persian Empire is a small, isolated community nestled on the side of a snowy mountain.

item.title: Sarah's Base
item.description: Coordinates: -300, -1050 Description Sarah’s base is a charming little lakeside cottage, perched on a rocky outcropping and surrounded by dense shrubbery.

item.title: Steampunk Tavern & Inn
item.description: Original State Source: 1.18 SMP concluding 18/05/22 Builder: Nicolas Aguayo Perez (blaze_mex) Coordinates: 2700, -3000 Township: Nico’s Base Current State Coordinates: -1600, 250 History The Steampunk Tavern & Inn, built by blaze_mex, was first established in the early days of Minecraftia.

item.title: The Apartments
item.description: Original State Source: 1.18 SMP concluding 18/05/22 Builder: Mac Lim (xXMagmaHDXx) Coordinates: 2600, -3050 Township: Nico’s Base Current State Coordinates: 2500, 2700 History The multi-level apartment complex was once a unique and ambitious structure, drawing inspiration from pipe apartment buildings and featuring a cylinder design that was unlike anything seen before.

item.title: The Arm Pub
item.description: Original State Source: 1.18 SMP concluding 18/05/22 Builder: Daniel Franklin (DevilDan) Coordinates: 2650, -2950 Township: Nico’s Base Current State Coordinates: -2280, -60 History The “Arm” was once a small and unassuming pub located in a quiet corner of a bustling city.

item.title: The Caves & Nether Portal
item.description: Coordinates: 0, -1200 (Below Ground) Description The Caves & Nether Portal located beneath the Mushroom Kingdom is a mysterious and intriguing labyrinth of underground tunnels and passageways.

item.title: The Market & Rohan's House
item.description: Coordinates: 560, -1480 Description The Market is a bustling hub of activity in the village. The market area is filled with stalls, each selling a variety of items, from tools and materials to food and dyes.

item.title: The Mushroom Kingdom
item.description: Coordinates: 0, -1200 Description The Mushroom Kingdom is a vibrant and mysterious community located directly north of spawn.

item.title: The Nether Portal
item.description: Coordinates: 490, -1520 Description The communal nether portal of Joe’s Classic Village is the primary gateway for travelers entering and leaving the village.

item.title: The Obelisk
item.description: Original State Source: 1.18 SMP concluding 18/05/22 Builder: Nicolas Aguayo Perez (blaze_mex) Coordinates: 2750, -2950 Township: Nico’s Base Current State Coordinates: 2280, 4200 History The Obelisk of Power is a tall, mysterious structure found in the world of Minecraftia.

item.title: The Quarry
item.description: Coordinates: 530, -1570 Description The Villager Quarry is a massive open pit in Minecraftia that stretches deep into the earth.

item.title: The Saloon
item.description: Coordinates: 580, -1500 Description

item.title: The Town Hall
item.description: Coordinates: 620, -1500 Description The town hall of Joe’s classic village is a warm and inviting space. A cosy fireplace takes center stage in the room, creating a comfortable atmosphere.

item.title: The Trading Village
item.description: Coordinates: -500, -1050 Description The trading village is a small outpost located far away from Danada, in the heart of a sparse Eucalyptus forest to the east.

item.title: The Windmill
item.description: Coordinates: 550, -1560 Description

item.title: Tomas's House
item.description: Coordinates: 540, -1500 Description
